articles.description: The Oxford/AstraZeneca vaccine is the second COVID shot to be approved in Australia, and it's likely Australians will start receiving it next month.
articles.content:
The Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) yesterday announced it has provisionally approved AstraZenecas COVID vaccine for use in Australia.
The approval applies to people over 18, including adults… [+6501 chars]
